name: Roni Lagin & Co.
description:
Roni Lagin & Co. is a friendly neighborhood design studio based in Philadelphia specializing in branding, web design, style guides, packaging, logos and poster design. Our clients are a mix of businesses, industries, and organizations. We’re “friendly” because we listen (we mean really listen) and learn about what our clients do best in their industry. The “neighborhood” means we’re easily approachable and you talk directly to a creative (not just an homage to Mr. Rogers).
Roni Lagin & Co. will work closely and collaboratively with you to meet your design needs.
